s0091: Lu lord doubted him, declined Wu Qi.
s0092: Wu Qi thus heard Wei Wen Hou worthy, wished to serve him.
s0093: Wen Hou asked Li Ke: 'Wu Qi what kind of person?'
s0094: Li Ke said: 'Qi greedy and fond of sex, yet using troops Sima Rangju cannot surpass.'
s0095: Thus Wei Wen Hou made him general, attacked Qin, captured five cities.
s0096: Qi's as general, with soldiers lowest ones shared clothing food.
s0097: Slept not set mat, marched not rode carriage, personally wrapped dried rations, with soldiers shared toil bitterness.
s0098: Soldier had sick carbuncle, Qi sucked it for him.
s0099: Soldier's mother heard and wept for him.
s0100: Person said: 'Your son soldier, yet general personally sucks his carbuncle, why weep?'
s0102: Past year Wu Gong sucked his father, his father fought not turned heels, thus died among enemies.
s0103: Wu Gong now again sucks his son, I do not know his death place.
s0106: Wen Hou because Wu Qi good at using troops, frugal upright, completely could obtain soldiers' hearts, thus made him Xihé governor, to resist Qin, Han.
s0107: Wei Wen Hou having died, Qi served his son Wu Hou.
s0108: Wu Hou floated Xihé and descended, middle stream, turned and told Wu Qi: 'Beautiful indeed mountains rivers' solidity, this Wei state's treasure!'
s0109: Qi answered: 'In virtue not in danger.
s0110: Formerly San Miao clan left Dongting, right Pengli, virtue righteousness not cultivated, Yu extinguished them.
s0111: Xia Jie residence, left He Ji, right Tai Hua, Yi Que in its south, Yang Chang in its north, cultivated governance not benevolent, Tang exiled him.
s0112: Yin Zhou state, left Meng Men, right Tai Hang, Chang Shan in its north, great river through its south, cultivated governance not virtuous, Wu Wang killed him.
s0113: From this observe, in virtue not in danger.
s0114: If lord not cultivate virtue, boat middle people all become enemy states.'
s0117: Enfeoffed Wu Qi as Xihé governor, very had reputation.
s0118: Wei established chancellor, chancellor Tian Wen.
s0119: Wu Qi not pleased, told Tian Wen: 'Please with you discuss merit, acceptable?'
s0121: Qi said: 'Lead three armies, make soldiers happily die, enemy states dare not plot, you which with Qi?'
s0122: Wen said: 'Not as good as you.'
